item.Q:
Write the character:
an interjection; to express realization or agreement (yes, oh, right etc)
item.A:
唉 (strokes unavailable)
āi
唉声叹气 (唉聲嘆氣) āishēngtànqì heave deep sighs; sigh in despair

traditional: 職
zhí
职工 (職工) zhígōng workers; staff

item.Q:
Write the character:
again; recover; reply to a letter; to repeat; to duplicate
item.A:
traditional: 復
fù
恢复 (恢復) huīfù to reinstate; to resume; to restore; to recover; to regain

item.Q:
Write the character:
to transport; to lose
item.A:
输 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 輸
shū
运输 (運輸) yùnshū transport; haulage; transit

traditional: 職
office; duty

item.Q:
Write the character: fù

traditional: 復
again; recover; reply to a letter; to repeat; to duplicate

item.Q:
Write the character: jié
(tiáojié de jié)
item.A:
traditional: 節
festival; section; segment; point; part; to economize; to save; temperate; classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses
调节 (調節) tiáojié adjust; regulate

item.Q:
Write the character: guī
(guīdìng de guī)
item.A:
traditional: 規
compass; rule
规定 (規定) guīdìng provision; to fix; to set; to formulate; to stipulate; to provide

traditional: 任職
rènzhí hold an office or post

traditional: 供職
gòngzhí hold an office or post

traditional: 公職
gōngzhí an official position

traditional: 去職
qùzhí to leave office

traditional: 在職
zàizhí incumbency

traditional: 專職
zhuānzhí special duty; assigned full time to a task

traditional: 就職
jiùzhí take office; assume a post

traditional: 本職
běnzhí one's job

traditional: 職位
zhíwèi post; office; position

traditional: 職務
zhíwù a post; a position

traditional: 職員
zhíyuán office worker; staff member

traditional: 職工
zhígōng workers; staff

traditional: 職業
zhíyè job occupation; profession

traditional: 職權
zhíquán authority; power over others

traditional: 職稱
zhíchēng one's professional position; title; job title

traditional: 職能
zhínéng function; role

traditional: 解職
jiězhí to dismiss from office; to discharge; to sack

traditional: 離職
lízhí retire; leave office; quit a job

traditional: 修復
xiūfù restoration

traditional: 光復
guāngfù to recover (territory or power); the liberation of Taiwan from Japanese rule in 1945

traditional: 光復會
guāngfùhuì anti-Qing revolutionary party set up in 1904 under Cai Yuanpei 蔡元培; same as 復古會|复古会

traditional: 反復
fǎnfù repeatedly; over and over

traditional: 回復
huífù "Re:"; in reply to (email); return (to some condition)

traditional: 報復
bàofù make reprisals; retaliate; revenge; retaliation

traditional: 往復
wǎngfù to reciprocate

traditional: 復位
xìawèi reposition

traditional: 復分解反應
fùfēnjiěfǎnyìng metathesis (chem.)

traditional: 復利
fùlì compound interest

traditional: 復原
fùyuán heal; recovery; restitution; reconstruction

traditional: 復員
fùyuán mobilization
xìayuán deactivate

traditional: 復活
fùhuó resurrection

traditional: 復發
fùfā (n) reappearance; (vi) reappear
xìafā to recur

traditional: 復選
xìaxuǎn Multi

traditional: 收復
shōufù to recover (lost territory etc); to recapture

traditional: 答復
dáfù to answer; to reply; Reply to: (in e-mail header)

traditional: 輸入
shūrù to import; to input

traditional: 輸出
shūchū to export; to output

traditional: 輸精管
shūjīngguǎn vas deferens

traditional: 輸電
shūdiàn electricity transmission; transmit electricity

traditional: 運輸
yùnshū transport; haulage; transit

traditional: 運輸機
yùnshūjī transporter

traditional: 使節
shǐjié (diplomatic) envoy

traditional: 外交使節
wàijiāoshǐjié envoy

traditional: 小節
xiǎojié a minor matter; trivia; bar (music)

traditional: 情節
qíngjié plot; circumstances

traditional: 時節
shíjié season; time

traditional: 神經節
shénjīngjié ganglion

traditional: 空氣調節
kōngqìdiàojié air conditioner

traditional: 章節
zhāngjié chapter; section

traditional: 節制
jiézhì to control; to restrict; to moderate; to temper; to administer

traditional: 節子
jiēzi knot

traditional: 節度使
jiédùshǐ Tang and Song dynasty provincial governor, in Tang times having military and civil authority, but only civil authority in Song

traditional: 節日
jiérì holiday; festival

traditional: 節氣
jiéqi solar term

traditional: 節片
jiépiàn proglottis

traditional: 節理
jiélǐ diaclases

traditional: 節目
jiémù program; item (on a program)

traditional: 節約
jiéyuē frugal; save

traditional: 節育
jiéyù birth control

traditional: 節間
jiéjiān internode

traditional: 節點
jiédiǎn node

traditional: 結節
jiéjié nodus

traditional: 萬向節
wànxiàngjié gimbal

traditional: 調節
tiáojié adjust; regulate

traditional: 調節器
diàojiéqì regulator
tiáojiéqì regulator

traditional: 變節
biànjié make a political recantation; turn one's coat

traditional: 過節
guòjié to celebrate a festival; after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)

traditional: 關節
guānjié joint

traditional: 音節
yīnjié syllable

traditional: 不規則
bùguīzé irregular

traditional: 定規
dìngguī established rule or practice

traditional: 常規
chángguī conventional (weapons); conventional; common; routine

traditional: 正規
zhèngguī regular; according to standards

traditional: 法規
fǎguī legislation; statute

traditional: 規則
guīzé rule; regulation; rules and regulations

traditional: 規定
guīdìng provision; to fix; to set; to formulate; to stipulate; to provide

traditional: 規格
guīgé standard; norm; specification

traditional: 規程
guīchéng rules; regulations

traditional: 規章
guīzhāng rule; regulation

traditional: 規約
guīyuē terms (of an agreement)

traditional: 量規
liàngguī ga u ge
